long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will display a notification when the streamer "ratzDoll", start's to live stream. This will give her audience a higher chance of being able to join in and watch the live stream as the twitch email system is unreliable and the mobile app is only useful if you have your phone right beside you.
